::Shadow wing::

She welded four more peices to the ship's hull before stopping for a 
break.  this was getting harder. the peiced didn't exactly fit.  The 
torches were getting hot and she was jsut getting tired.   She set 
her torch down and took a seat under a tree.  She looked at the 
ship.  She hoped Lunarpine would be OK.
